transcript.title: STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON. P. J. KEATING MP
transcript.content:
STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON. P. J. KEATING, MP
SENATOR SIBRAA'S REPORT
I have today received the attached report from Senator
Sibraa on matters relating to Mr Gregory Symons.
I will examine the report and await Senator Richardson's
report on this matter which will be presented to me on
Monday. CANBERRA May 15, 1992
